Key Match Events: Marcus Semien hit a leadoff home run in the first inning
Nathaniel Lowe hit a home run in the first inning
Andrew Heaney pitched six quality innings
Travis Jankowski singled and made a throwing error by Los Angeles in the bottom of the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers are trying to finish the season strongly and see what their younger players can do
They are giving injured veterans a chance to compete before the winter
The team is setting a foundation that can carry into next season
Post-Match Reflections: Bruce Bochy believes it's the best stretch of baseball they've had this season
The Rangers' 10-3 record in their last 13 games is the best in the American League
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers won three of four games against the Angels
They claimed their first seven-win homestand in Globe Life Field history
They have won four consecutive series and have 10 wins in a 13-game stretch for the first time since last year
